alert.note: Alert for Appanoose; Davis; Jasper; Lucas; Mahaska; Marion; Monroe; Polk; Poweshiek; Wapello; Warren; Wayne (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 25 at 9:58PM CST until November 26 at 8:00AM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...First Measurable Snowfall of the Season For Portions of Southern into Central Iowa... .Snow will continue to move across the area through the night impacting much of central and southern Iowa. Conditions may become quite slick in some areas, especially as the initial snow melts and refreezes onto roadways. This has resulted in numerous accidents across central and southern Iowa late this afternoon and into the evening. Light to moderate snow accumulations are expected in portions of southern into central Iowa through Sunday morning. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches with localized higher amounts. * WHERE...Much of South central Iowa. * WHEN...Until 8 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on very slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This will be the first measurable snowfall of the season in these areas. Be prepared for snow covered roads and allow extra time to reach your destination.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel conditions, check the Iowa 511 app, www.511ia.org, or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Appanoose; Davis; Jasper; Lucas; Mahaska; Marion; Monroe; Polk; Poweshiek; Wapello; Warren; Wayne
